Description: Casual hotel dining room offering American fare, including breakfast, plus a lounge with TV sports.

summary.snippet: "Great food lot of food for the price and service was fast I'll go back again."
"I ordered the Cajun pasta, which was overly salted."
"Nice homey environment for late night meals."

most_relevant.description: I had the 2 meat combo with ribs and brisket. The rub seasoning was very good and the BBQ sauce was amazing! Some of the best BBQ I’ve ever eaten! Nick, the manager waited on me. He was great! Very attentive and sociable. I recommend Relish to anyone that loves BBQ, especially to the weary road warriors like myself.

Service was good, water glass was a bit dirty when I sat down. The food was not bad but not great either. The chicken was too dry and brisket didn’t amaze. Definitely decent for being a hotel restaurant. If anything the appetizer was the best part.
I was having brunch with my relatives and really enjoyed it. The staffs are super friendly, however the food took some time. I loved the ambience. No issues in finding parking.

Service was efficient. Staff was polite and friendly. Pulled pork was heavenly. Not over spiced with sauce on the side. The way we like it. If have the chance will try the rest of the BBQ selections.
Also the whitefish paste really compliments the meal. First time customer. Cost below includes two drinks.

First time to University Michigan for parents weekend. Last minute called for reservations for 6. They said yes and the BBQ was amazing. Lisa was our waitress. Great service Amazing food. Will definitely come back.

We stayed at the neighboring hotel and after checking in we found out the restaurant was closed (at 5:45PM on a Saturday). The staff member says to us "go next door to The Kensington, they have a restaurant called Re•Lish. Way better food anyway". So we walked next door to Re•Lish. We were glad our hotels restaurant was closed about 5mins after sitting down. Our server, Donte, was fantastic. Food was great. Our appetizer was the Corned Beef Egg Rolls, I got the Seared Mahi Mahi and my wife got the 3 PC fried chicken. Well prepared and fast service. We ended up going back the next day for breakfast, Donte was our server again (fantastic server). Really great breakfast. We are already talking about stopping in there when we travel to the Detroit Zoo (which we do quite frequently) because it is on our way.

Michael and Leann were absolutely amazing! I was in Ann Arbor for a very special time of meeting my biological family for the 1st time. Their kind, friendly, and attentive service couldn't have been better. The food was just as amazing and even accommodated a vegan diet. The entire staff was awesome, but the personal touch was Leann's giant hug and best wishes as I headed to meet my family for the 1st time. Thank you for being a part of making it that much greater!
~Dianna

The staff are super friendly.  Food is delicious. The chef heard I had a gluten allergy and made a special dessert just for me that was AMAZING . I was dining alone and they made me feel at home. Great experience all around.
